title: Search Engine & Performance Optimization Services
description: Improve your website’s SEO and performance with Westtown Websites. From keyword optimization to Core Web Vitals audits, we ensure your site ranks higher and delivers a fast, seamless user experience.

faqItems.question: What is SEO and why is it important?
faqItems.answer: SEO, or Search Engine Optimization, is the process of improving your website to increase its visibility on search engines like Google. The better your SEO, the higher your site will rank in search results, driving more traffic to your business.

faqItems.question: How long does it take to see SEO results?
faqItems.answer: SEO is a long-term strategy, and results typically start to show within 3 to 6 months. However, the timeline can vary depending on the competitiveness of your industry and the current state of your website.

faqItems.question: What are Core Web Vitals, and how do they impact SEO?
faqItems.answer: Core Web Vitals are a set of metrics that measure your website's loading speed, interactivity, and visual stability. These factors are important to both user experience and SEO, as Google considers them when ranking websites.

faqItems.question: Do you offer technical SEO services?
faqItems.answer: Yes, we offer a full range of technical SEO services, including optimizing your site's architecture, improving crawlability, resolving errors, and implementing schema markup for better search visibility.

faqItems.question: Will you optimize my site for mobile?
faqItems.answer: Absolutely! Mobile optimization is critical for SEO, as Google uses mobile-first indexing. We ensure your website is responsive, fast-loading, and user-friendly across all devices.

faqItems.question: How do you track SEO performance?
faqItems.answer: We use tools like Google Analytics and Google Search Console to monitor your website's traffic, rankings, and performance. We also provide reports so you can see the improvements over time.

aboutSection.heading: SEO & Performance Optimization
aboutSection.content:
Want your website to drive more traffic and boost your business? We build fast, high-performing sites that not only rank higher on search engines but deliver a seamless experience for your audience.

Our proven SEO and performance strategies are tailored to your goals, turning your website into a valuable asset for growth. Ready to take the next step? Let’s work together to make it happen.

masonryLayout.title: Technical SEO
masonryLayout.description: We ensure your website's architecture is SEO-friendly, from crawlability to sitemaps and schema markup. Our technical SEO ensures search engines can easily index and rank your website, giving you an edge in search rankings.

masonryLayout.title: Core Web Vitals
masonryLayout.description: We optimize for Google's Core Web Vitals, focusing on site speed, responsiveness, and visual stability. These metrics not only improve user experience but also boost your SEO performance and rankings.

masonryLayout.title: Mobile Optimization
masonryLayout.description: As mobile-first indexing becomes the standard, we ensure your website is fully optimized for mobile devices. This means fast loading times, responsive design, and a seamless experience for mobile users.

masonryLayout.title: On-Page SEO
masonryLayout.description: We refine the content, metadata, and keyword structure of each page on your website to ensure it ranks highly for relevant searches. Our approach ensures that both search engines and users find your content easily.

masonryLayout.title: Performance Monitoring
masonryLayout.description: Continuous monitoring and tweaking are essential to long-term SEO success. We keep track of your website’s performance, making adjustments when needed to maintain optimal load times and search rankings.

cta.title: Ready to Boost Your Website’s Performance?
cta.description: Let Westtown Websites help you rank higher, load faster, and turn visitors into customers. With our proven SEO and performance strategies, your website can become the growth engine your business needs.
